Description: This project is a web application that allows users to browse and view a collection of Lego sets. Users can explore Lego sets by themes, view details of individual sets. User should have authorization to add/remove/edit from the collection by signup/login.
Technologies Used: JS, Tailwind, EJS, Express, Node.js, MongoDB

Description: This is a full-stack MERN web application. Users can add/delete/create workouts to their own account. Using JWT to communicate the authentication status between the browser and the server. Also making hash passwords before saving them to the database
A website for a real estate agent with using thumbnail to show a breif description of each property. Includes contact form with validation and a confirmation alert.
